name: grafana
description: Grafana is a powerful data visualization and dashboarding platform that integrates with various data sources. It allows teams to build and share dashboards, alerts, and monitoring views. Available for self-hosting or managed cloud.
features: Data Visualization: Create interactive dashboards with charts, graphs, and custom visualizations.
Multi-Source Support: Connect to Prometheus, InfluxDB, Elasticsearch, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and dozens of other data sources.
Alerting System: Configure alerts with multiple notification channels including email, Slack, and PagerDuty.
Dashboard Sharing: Share dashboards with teams, export as JSON, or embed in other applications.
Plugin Ecosystem: Extend functionality with community and commercial plugins for data sources and panels.
Query Builder: Visual query editor and support for native query languages for each data source.
User Management: Role-based access control with teams, organizations, and folder permissions.
Cloud or Self-Hosted: Choose between managed Grafana Cloud or self-hosted deployment.
